column3: Elaborated an integrative national plan to fight against NCDs, taking into account the harmful use of alcohol.
Reduced the allowed limits of alcohol consumption for drivers.
Alcohol banned by governmental tertiary institutions in their areas.
Established the Sub-Directorate for the Control of NCDs.
Implemented sensitization programmes in schools and work places about the harmful use of alcohol, alongside intense media campaigning.
Adopted Statutory Instruments regulating the permitted hours of alcohol sale.
Established the Central Drug Authority, adopted the National Drug Master Plan 2013 - 2017, and promulgated the Prevention of and Treatment for Substance Abuse Act No. 70 of 2008.
